text: Hippolyte De Kempeneer (1876–1944) was a Belgian film producer and director. He was one of the pioneers of the Belgian film industry during the silent era.Mathijs p.16 ==Selected filmography== ===Producer=== * A Farmyard Drama (1921) * The Judge (1921) * Ramparts of Brabant (1921) * Belgian Revenge (1922) ==References== ==Further reading== * Ernest Mathijs. The Cinema of the Low Countries. Wallflower Press, 2004. ==External links== * Category:1876 births Category:1944 deaths Category:Belgian film producers Category:Belgian film directors Category:People from Anderlecht
title: Hippolyte De Kempeneer
